info.title: SCIM
info.description: The SCIM API lets you manage users in your organization. You can then automate the provisioning of product licenses for these users, and they can use your company's Single Sign-On solution through an Identity Provider.

tags.name: Users
tags.description: Operations on users belonging to an organization

tags.name: Groups
tags.description: Operations on groups belonging to an organization

get.description: Queries multiple group identities in the organization domain. Filtering, sorting and pagination are available. This call requires the role ROLE_ORG_READ.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Without a filter, all groups are returned. The filter parameter must be a properly formed SCIM filter using the operator "eq" (equals), "sw" (starts with), or "co" (contains). The filter works for the displayName attribute. Sorting and pagination are supported. For example, GET /Groups?filter=displayName%20eq%20%22Engineering%22&sortBy=displayName&sortOrder=ascending&count=50&startIndex=51

502.description: Authentication or account gateway error occurred

504.description: Authentication or account gateway timeout occurred

post.description: Creates a new organization group and adds it to the user domain. Member groups and member users must be in the organization. This call requires the role ROLE_ORG_WRITE.

requestBody.description: The details of the group to create

400.description:
Possible reasons are:
The displayName field is not set
The displayName field is malformed
The displayName field exceeds 128 characters
The members array exceeds 100 elements

409.description: The displayName is already in use within the organization

502.description: An authentication or account gateway error occurred

504.description: An authentication or account, or gateway timeout occurred.

get.description: Queries group details in the organization domain. This call requires the role ROLE_ORG_READ.

parameters.name: groupKey
parameters.description: The key of the group to query. The group must be in the organization domain

401.description: Client is not sufficiently authorized or group does not exist in organization

502.description: Authentication or account gateway error occurred

504.description: Authentication or account gateway timeout occurred

put.description: Updates an existing group. The request must include the full group definition. To modify one or more values without sending the full definition, see "Update Group". Member groups and member users must be in the organization. This call requires the role ROLE_ORG_WRITE.

parameters.name: groupKey
parameters.description: The key of the group to query. The group must be in the organization domain

400.description:
Possible reasons are:
The displayName field is not set
The displayName field is malformed
The displayName field exceeds 128 characters
The members array exceeds 100 elements

401.description: Client is not sufficiently authorized or group does not exist in organization

409.description: The displayName is already in use within the organization

502.description: Authentication or account gateway error occurred

504.description: Authentication or account gateway timeout occurred

delete.description: Deletes a group from the organization (but not from the account). The group must be in the organization. This call requires the role ROLE_ORG_WRITE.

parameters.name: groupKey
parameters.description: The key of the group to query. The group must be in the organization domain

401.description: Client is not sufficiently authorized or group does not exist in organization

502.description: Authentication or account gateway error occurred

504.description: Authentication or account gateway timeout occurred

patch.description: Updates one or more values of an existing group without sending the full definition. Member groups and member users must be in the organization. This call requires the role ROLE_ORG_WRITE.

parameters.name: groupKey
parameters.description: The key of the group to query. The group must be in the organization domain

requestBody.description: The group data to update. It is allowed to update one or more values of the group definition

400.description:
Possible reasons are:
The displayName field is not set
The displayName field is malformed
The displayName field exceeds 128 characters
The members array exceeds 100 elements

401.description: Client is not sufficiently authorized or group does not exist in organization

409.description: The displayName is already in use within the organization

502.description: Authentication or account gateway error occurred

504.description: Authentication or account gateway timeout occurred

get.description: Queries the user schema. The user schema is defined in SCIM Core Schema (http://www.simplecloud.info/specs/draft-scim-core-schema-01.html#resource-schema).

502.description: Authentication or account gateway error occurred

504.description: Authentication or account gateway timeout occurred

get.description: Queries service provider configurations. The service provider configurations are defined in SCIM Core Schema (http://www.simplecloud.info/specs/draft-scim-core-schema-01.html#anchor6). This call returns a description, a documentationURL, name, and specURL.

502.description: Authentication or account gateway error occurred

504.description: Authentication or account gateway timeout occurred

get.description: Queries multiple user identities in the organization domain. Filtering is available.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Without a filter, all users in a user domain are returned. The filter parameter must be a properly formed SCIM filter using either the operator eq (equals) or the operator sw (starts with). The filter works for userName, displayName, name.givenName, and name.familyName attributes. For example, /Users?filter=name.familyName%20eq%20%%22Smith%22

502.description: Authentication or account gateway error occurred

504.description: Authentication or account gateway timeout occurred

post.description: Creates a new organization user and adds them to the user domain. The user email domain must match an existing organization email domain.

requestBody.description: The details of the user to create

400.description:
One of the following requirements is not met:
The userName field is required.
The userName field must be non-empty.
The userName field cannot exceed 128 characters.
The locale field must be composed of 1 or 2 parts.
The locale language sub-field must be ISO-639.
The locale country sub-field must be ISO-3166.
The timezone field must be a valid timezone.
The givenName field must not exceed 60 characters.
The familyName field must not exceed 60 characters.

502.description: Authentication, account, or email verification gateway error occurred.

504.description: Authentication, account, or email verification gateway timeout occurred.

get.description: Queries the identity of the current authenticated user.

502.description: Authentication or account gateway error occurred

504.description: Authentication or account gateway timeout occurred

put.description: Changes the current authenticated user's displayName, locale, timezone, username and password. The request must include the full user definition (to modify one or more values without sending the full definition, see Update User). The replaced user email domain must be an existing organization email domain.

200.description: The current user has been replaced.

400.description:
One of the following requirements is not met:
The userName field is required.
The userName field must be non-empty.
The userName field cannot exceed 128 characters.
The locale field must be composed of 1 or 2 parts.
The locale language sub-field must be ISO-639.
The locale country sub-field must be ISO-3166.
The timezone field must be a valid timezone.
The givenName field must not exceed 60 characters.
The familyName field must not exceed 60 characters.

502.description: Authentication or account gateway error occurred

504.description: Authentication or account gateway timeout occurred

patch.description: Changes a limited set (or all if you choose) of the current authenticated user's data. The updated user email domain must be an existing organization email domain.

200.description: The current user has been updated.

400.description:
One of the following requirements is not met:
The userName field is required.
The userName field must be non-empty.
The userName field cannot exceed 128 characters.
The locale field must be composed of 1 or 2 parts.
The locale language sub-field must be ISO-639.
The locale country sub-field must be ISO-3166.
The timezone field must be a valid timezone.
The givenName field must not exceed 60 characters.
The familyName field must not exceed 60 characters.

502.description: Authentication or account gateway error occurred

504.description: Authentication or account gateway timeout occurred

get.description: Queries user identity in the organization domain.

parameters.name: userKey
parameters.description: The key of the user to query. The user must be in the organization domain

502.description: Authentication or account gateway error occurred

504.description: Authentication or account gateway timeout occurred

put.description: Changes an existing user's displayName, locale, timezone, username and password. The request must include the full user definition (to modify one or more values without sending the full definition, see Update User). The replaced user email domain must be an existing organization email domain.

parameters.name: userKey
parameters.description: The key of the user to query. The user must be in the organization domain

400.description:
One of the following requirements is not met:
The userName field is required.
The userName field must be non-empty.
The userName field cannot exceed 128 characters.
The locale field must be composed of 1 or 2 parts.
The locale language sub-field must be ISO-639.
The locale country sub-field must be ISO-3166.
The timezone field must be a valid timezone.
The givenName field must not exceed 60 characters.
The familyName field must not exceed 60 characters.

502.description: Authentication or account gateway error occurred

504.description: Authentication or account gateway timeout occurred

parameters.name: userKey

parameters.name: userKey
parameters.description: The key of the user to query. The user must be in the organization domain

400.description:

The userName field is required.

The locale field must be composed of 1 or 2 parts.
The locale language sub-field must be ISO-639.
The locale country sub-field must be ISO-3166.

description.description: The description of the Authentication Scheme

documentationUrl.description: A HTTP addressable URL pointing to the Authentication Scheme's usage documentation

name.description: The common authentication scheme name, e.g. HTTP Basic

specUrl.description: A HTTP addressable URL pointing to the Authentication Scheme's specification

supported.description: Specifies whether the operation is supported

Group.description: Describes a group belonging to an organization

totalResults.description: The number of groups in the collection

GroupCollection.description: Class describing a collection of groups

created.description: The date and time the group was created

location.description: The URL where the group can be accessed

value.description: Depending on the member type this is a groupKey or an userKey

Member.description: A member of a group. This can be a group or an user

supported.description: Specifies whether the operation is supported

endpoint.description: The resource's HTTP addressable endpoint relative to the base URL, e.g. /Users.

schema.description: The resource's associated schema, e.g. urn:scim:schemas:core:1.0

ResourceSchema.description: Describes the attributes and metadata constituting a resource such as a user.

caseExact.description: Indicates whether the attribute is case sensitive

multiValued.description: Indicates whether the attribute can have multiple values

readOnly.description: Indicates whether the attribute is mutable

required.description: Indicates whether the attribute is required

schema.description: The attribute's associated scheme, e.g. urn:scim:schemas:core:1.0

type.description: The attribute's data type, e.g. String

caseExact.description: Indicates whether the attribute is case sensitive

readOnly.description: Indicates whether the attribute is mutable

required.description: Indicates whether the attribute is required

type.description: The attribute's data type, e.g. String

SchemaSubAttribute.description: Describes the sub-attribute of a resource attribute

documentationUrl.description: An HTTP addressable URL pointing to the Service Provider's help documentation

supported.description: Specifies whether the operation is supported

userName.description: The user's username, usually their email address

User.description: Describes a user belonging to an organization

totalResults.description: The number of users in the collection

userName.description: The user's username, usually their email address

UserFullName.description: The full name of the user

created.description: The date and time the user was created

location.description: The URL where the user can be accessed

supported.description: Specifies whether the operation is supported

XmlDataFormat.description: Specifies whether the XML data format is supported
